Thumbor made our lives better. We moved to Thumbor and now, we cannot live without it
Properati
Thumbor allows Yipit to iterate quickly on new designs. Our initial Thumbor installation took less than an hour to set up, and we haven't had to spend much time thinking about it since then.
Yipit
With Thumbor we can quickly iterate and make changes to our layouts serving the optimal image format each time. Thumbor is awesome!
oony
Thumbor helps us in decoupling applications from our storage backend. We were able to move from a centralized NFS storage to a distributed storage with a simple plug-in. Thumbor is really comfortable for Ops.
Viadeo
We use Thumbor to generate mobile thumbnails that requires dealing with masks, feature trimming, transparent images, and replacing backgrounds. Thumbor made this possible and simple.
